AT.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
AT.description: Runner2 ist der Nachfolger des gefeierten und mit einem IGF-Award ausgezeichneten BIT.TRIP RUNNER. Ganz im Stil der BIT.TRIP-Reihe ist Runner2 ein rhythmisches Jump'n'Run. Der Spieler rennt zum brandneuen Soundtrack durch fantastische Landschaften. Dank neuer Fähigkeiten sprintet, hüpft, gleitet, tritt und fliegt man dem Ziel entgegen, Timbletot und seinen Plan, alle Welten auszulöschen, zu stoppen. Runner2 bietet fünf aufregende Welten, 120 betörende Level und fünf waghalsige BOSS-Kämpfe. Spiele acht verschiedene Charaktere und finde versteckte Gebiete, um neue verrückte Kostüme freizuschalten.

AU.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
AU.description: Runner2 is the sequel to the critically acclaimed and IGF award winning BIT.TRIP RUNNER. In the style of the BIT.TRIP series, Runner2 is a rhythm-music platforming game. Players will run through fantastic environments, using brand new moves, to brand new soundtracks as they run, jump, slide, kick, and soar towards the goal of tracking down the Timbletot and thwarting his evil plans to destroy not only our world, but every world there is. Runner2 features 5 exciting worlds, 120 tantalizing levels and 5 death defying BOSS battles! Play as 8 different characters - find secret areas to unlock new and zany costumes!

BG.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
BG.description: Runner2 is the sequel to the critically acclaimed and IGF award winning BIT.TRIP RUNNER. In the style of the BIT.TRIP series, Runner2 is a rhythm-music platforming game. Players will run through fantastic environments, using brand new moves, to brand new soundtracks as they run, jump, slide, kick, and soar towards the goal of tracking down the Timbletot and thwarting his evil plans to destroy not only our world, but every world there is. Runner2 features 5 exciting worlds, 120 tantalizing levels and 5 death defying BOSS battles! Play as 8 different characters - find secret areas to unlock new and zany costumes!

BE.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
BE.description: Runner2 est la suite de BIT.TRIP RUNNER., le vainqueur du prix IGF acclamé par la critique. Dans la veine des titres BIT.TRIP, Runner2 est un jeu de plateformes où l'action se déroule au rythme de la musique. Les joueurs disposent d'une nouvelle panoplie de mouvements et peuvent courir, sauter, glisser ou donner des coups de pied pour vaincre le Timbletot et l'empêcher de détruire non seulement notre monde, mais aussi les autres. Runner2 contient cinq mondes fascinants, 120 niveaux coriaces et cinq BOSS redoutables ! Incarnez huit personnages différents et trouvez les zones secrètes pour débloquer de nouvelles tenues loufoques !

ES.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
ES.description: Runner 2 es la secuela del aclamado juego BIT.TRIP RUNNER, ganador del premio IGF. Siguiendo el estilo de la serie BIT.TRIP, Runner2 es un juego de plataformas rítmico. Los jugadores recorrerán fantásticos escenarios saltando, corriendo, deslizándose, pegando patadas y planeando al ritmo de una nueva banda sonora y utilizando nuevos movimientos para dar con Timbletot y desbaratar su maléfico plan de destruir no solo nuestro mundo, sino todos los que existen. Runner2 incluye cinco emocionantes mundos, 120 niveles desafiantes y cinco batallas a vida o muerte contra un jefe. Puedes escoger entre ocho personajes diferentes. ¡Encuentra las áreas secretas y desbloquea nuevos y originales conjuntos!

IT.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
IT.description: Runner2 è il seguito di BIT.TRIP RUNNER, titolo acclamato dalla critica e premiato all'IGF. Anche questo gioco, come gli altri della serie BIT.TRIP, offre tutto il divertimento di un platform a ritmo musicale. Attraversa ambientazioni fantastiche, sfrutta le nuove mosse a tua disposizione e crea colonne musicali mentre corri, salti, scivoli, calci e plani. Il tuo obiettivo è raggiungere Timbletot e sventare il suo malefico piano di distruggere non solo questo mondo, ma anche qualsiasi altro esistente. Runner2 ti conquisterà grazie alle sue avventure in cinque fantastici mondi, altrettante battaglie con temibili BOSS e ben 120 livelli pieni di adrenalina. Vesti i panni di uno degli otto protagonisti, scopri aree segrete e sblocca nuovi buffi travestimenti.

LT.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien

NL.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
NL.description: Runner2 is het vervolg op het veelgeprezen en winnaar van de IGF-award, BIT.TRIP RUNNER. Geheel in de stijl van de BIT.TRIP-reeks, is Runner2 een ritmisch-muzikaal platformspel. Spelers rennen door fantastische omgevingen, gebruiken splinternieuwe bewegingen en luisteren naar een gloednieuwe soundtrack terwijl ze springen, glijden, schoppen en zweven op hun missie om de Timbletot op te sporen en zijn kwaadaardige plannen om niet alleen onze wereld maar ook alle andere werelden te vernietigen, te verijdelen. Het spel bevat vijf spannende werelden, 120 uitdagende levels en vijf bloedstollende baasgevechten! Je kunt kiezen uit acht verschillende personages - vind geheime gebieden om nieuwe en waanzinnige outfits vrij te spelen.

NZ.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
NZ.description: Runner2 is the sequel to the critically acclaimed and IGF award winning BIT.TRIP RUNNER. In the style of the BIT.TRIP series, Runner2 is a rhythm-music platforming game. Players will run through fantastic environments, using brand new moves, to brand new soundtracks as they run, jump, slide, kick, and soar towards the goal of tracking down the Timbletot and thwarting his evil plans to destroy not only our world, but every world there is. PL.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
PL.description: Runner2 is the sequel to the critically acclaimed and IGF award winning BIT.TRIP RUNNER. In the style of the BIT.TRIP series, Runner2 is a rhythm-music platforming game. Players will run through fantastic environments, using brand new moves, to brand new soundtracks as they run, jump, slide, kick, and soar towards the goal of tracking down the Timbletot and thwarting his evil plans to destroy not only our world, but every world there is. Runner2 features 5 exciting worlds, 120 tantalizing levels and 5 death defying BOSS battles! Play as 8 different characters - find secret areas to unlock new and zany costumes!

PT.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
PT.description: Runner2 é a sequela de BIT.TRIP RUNNER, jogo aclamado pela crítica e vencedor de um prémio IGF. Ao estilo da série BIT.TRIP, Runner2 é um jogo que mistura ritmo, música e plataformas. Os jogadores terão que correr através de ambientes fantásticos utilizando movimentos inovadores, ao som de novas bandas sonoras, à medida que saltam, deslizam, dão pontapés e voam em direção ao objetivo de localizar Timbletot e arruinar os seus planos maléficos de destruição, não só do nosso mundo, mas de qualquer mundo existente. Runner2 apresenta cinco mundos empolgantes, 120 níveis alucinantes e cinco perigosíssimas batalhas BOSS! Joga na pele de oito personagens diferentes - encontra áreas secretas para desbloquear vestuário novo e divertido!

RU.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
RU.description: Представляем Runner2 — продолжение игры BIT.TRIP RUNNER, очень тепло принятой игровым сообществом и отмеченной наградой IGF. Сиквел создан в лучших традициях серии BIT.TRIP: это платформер, который разовьет у вас чувство музыки и ритма. Вам предстоит нестись сломя голову по фантастическим мирам в погоне за злодеем Timbletot, который вознамерился уничтожить не только нашу планету, но и все виртуальные и реальные миры. Прыгайте, летайте, скользите, перемахивайте через препятствия, лупите по ним что есть духу. И все это — под новую музыку и с новыми движениями персонажей! Откройте для себя 5 новых потрясающих миров и 120 увлекательных уровней. Вам предстоит провести 5 поединков с боссами, каждый из которых может стать для вас последним. Выберите одного из 8 персонажей — и вперед, на поиски приключений. Не забывайте о потайных уровнях: каждый раз при их прохождении вы получите новый экстравагантный костюмчик.

SE.name: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
SE.description: Runner2 is the sequel to the critically acclaimed and IGF award winning BIT.TRIP RUNNER. In the style of the BIT.TRIP series, Runner2 is a rhythm-music platforming game.
